introBox.headline: How it works
text: This sample project demonstrates how to use a single CodePipeline to deploy your stacks across multiple accounts. This example specifically uses a stack with a CloudFront distribution in front of an S3 Bucket to serve as a static website.
After deploying the CDK, the stack will continue to be re-deployed to both accounts as you make changes to the project via the CodeCommit repository.
This pattern uses a CodePipeline with a CodeCommit repository and CodeBuild; as well as an S3 Bucket and a CloudFront distribution and OAI to access objects in the bucket
